Ji-Eun Byun

Decision-making under uncertainty on complex systems

Biography

Professional Career

  • Lecturer at University of Glasgow, 2022~Present.
  • Postdoctoral Researcher, Engineering Risk Analysis Group, Technical University of Munich, Germany, 2021~2022.
  • Postdoctoral Researcher, EPICentre, University College London, UK, 2020~2021.

Education

  • BS — Civil & Environmental Eng.. Seoul National University, South Korea, 2011~2015.
  • MS/PhD — Civil & Environmental Eng.. Seoul National University, South Korea, 2015~2020.

Affiliations and Other Activities

  • Elected Young Member of Committee, Earthquake Engineering Field Investigation Team (EEFIT), 2023~Present.
  • Turkey-Syria 2023 Earthquake Reconnaissance mission, Earthquake Engineering Field Investigation Team (EEFIT), 2023.

Award

  • Humboldt Research Fellowship for Postdoctoral Researchers, Alexander von Humboldt Foundation, 2021~2022.
  • CERRA student recognition award for 13th International Conference on Applications of Statistics and Probability in Civil Engineering (ICASP13), 2019.
  • Awards for outstanding papers by Korean Society of Civil Engineers, 2016.

Journal Review

Reliability Engineering and System Safety; Structural Safety; Scientific Reports; Probabilistic Engineering Mechanics; International Journal of Disaster Risk Reduction; IEEE Transactions on Reliability; Knowledge-Based Systems
